title: Guidance

Guidance Divination Cantrip The target gains a +1d4 bonus to Ability Checks. 10 turns Melee Concentration Action

Divination Cantrip

The target gains a +1d4 bonus to Ability Checks.

Melee Concentration

Guidance is a Divination Cantrip in Baldur's Gate 3. It provides a bonus to ability checks.

Guidance Information

Description: The target gains a +1d4 bonus to Ability Checks. Level: Cantrip School: Divination Casting Time: Action Range: Melee Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Guidance

Guidance can be acquired by the following classes: Cleric, Druid, Warlock (Pact of the Tome), Arcane Archer Guidance can be cast by using the following Items: Silver Pendant

Cleric, Druid, Warlock (Pact of the Tome), Arcane Archer

Guidance Tips & Notes

Perhaps the best Cantrip in the game, essential for social interactions with NPCs. Don't adventure forth without it. Guidance can be applied dynamically during dice rolls by clicking on the Add Bonus icon at the bottom of the screen. Differences from D&D 5th Edition: In 5E, guidance only affects one ability check during the duration rather than all of them.
